@MoviesWales That is such a great sequence. It'll be interesting to see if they do future instalments whether it'll go in another direction
@MoviesWales That's the thing, for me it's a case of "it ain't broke, don't fix it". Each works for me, so I can overlook their similarities
@MoviesWales I know a few people who would agree with you. Personally, I think it's great, but Ultimatum will always be the best.

@jumpcutjakob Good luck, mate. She's a fantastic actress.
